CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc East Ebony?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc East Ebony is arc {Carterside}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Paulview?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Paulview is arc {Carterside}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {East Ebony} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Carterside to Paulview in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Paulview to Carterside in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Carterside and Paulview in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Carterside and Paulview is {877}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Paulview and East Ebony in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Paulview and East Ebony is {1173}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from East Ebony?
SC.A: The total flow output from East Ebony is {3127}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Paulview?
SC.A: The total flow input by Paulview is {1751}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 1820? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1954} from {East Ebony} to {Carterside}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 1251? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1173} from {East Ebony} to {Paulview}, a flow of {877} from {Paulview} to {Carterside}, a flow of {578} from {Carterside} to {Paulview}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 727 and 1507? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1329} from {Paulview} to {East Ebony}, a flow of {1173} from {East Ebony} to {Paulview}, a flow of {877} from {Paulview} to {Carterside}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from East Ebony to Paulview or from Carterside to East Ebony?
NC.A: The flow from {Carterside} to {East Ebony} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Paulview to East Ebony, from East Ebony to Carterside, or from Carterside to East Ebony?
NC.A: The flow from {East Ebony} to {Carterside} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Paulview}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Carterside} and {East Ebony}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Carterside, Arc East Ebony, Arc Paulview}.
